label.tax_country_label: Country you are liable to pay tax in

validation_error_messages.same_tax_country: {{country}} has already been selected {{count}} times. Please select a different country.
validation_error_messages.national_insurance_number: Please enter a valid National Insurance number
validation_error_messages.tax_identification_number: Please enter a valid Tax Identification number

comply_message: Seedrs needs to comply with your resident states tax authority requirements regarding the exchange of information under the Common Reporting Standards (CRS). For more information <1>see here</1>.

no_tax_residency_view.heading: Sorry, only registered tax payers can invest.
no_tax_residency_view.description_1: If you wish to disable your account, please contact us at <1>support@seedrs.com</1>.
no_tax_residency_view.description_2: Please go back a step to provide your tax number to continue.

modal.heading_1: Why do we ask you what country you pay tax in?
modal.description_1: Seedrs is required by law to collect your tax residency information.
modal.heading_2: Where can I find my National Insurance number or Tax Identification Number?
modal.description_2: It’s on your National Insurance card, benefit letter, payslip or P60. For example, ‘QQ 12 34 56 C’.
